title: Blue Ridge Parkway: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People       The Blue Ridge Parkway is an experience like no other. Throughout the span of 470 miles, there are various historical stories that you can learn. Most of these stories are of important people who have helped shape the history of these mountains and the Blue Ridge Parkway. See below to learn more about how these people played an important role in the foundation of the Parkway, and the history of these mountains.          Stanley Abbott        Native American  Culture and Influence           Orlean Puckett        Brinegar Family        Moses Cone         R.Getty Browning        Abbie Rowe
